name: i
description:
>>>> LUDUM DARE PAGE <<<<

don't worry about it. don't worry about anything for a while.

stress will be the death of us.

there is a button for jumping, and a button for dashing. you can do a jump and a dash in the air 1nce for every spirit you clear.

watch the gif to the right for tips ;)

@takorii & @funbyjohn - made the game

@zenuell - made the music
